      • getOrientation

        public static int getOrientation(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView)
        Finds the layout orientation of the RecyclerView, no matter which LayoutManager is in use.
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - the RecyclerView with LayoutManager instance in use
        Returns:
        one of OrientationHelper.HORIZONTAL, OrientationHelper.VERTICAL

      • getSpanCount

        public static int getSpanCount(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView)
        Helper method to retrieve the number of the columns (span count) of the given LayoutManager.

        All Layouts are supported.

        Parameters:
        recyclerView - the RecyclerView with LayoutManager instance in use
        Returns:
        the span count
        Since:
        5.0.0-b7

      • findFirstCompletelyVisibleItemPosition

        public static int findFirstCompletelyVisibleItemPosition(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView)
        Helper method to find the adapter position of the first completely visible view [for each span], no matter which Layout is.
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - the RecyclerView with LayoutManager instance in use
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the first fully visible item or RecyclerView.NO_POSITION if there aren't any visible items.
        Since:
        5.0.0-b8
        See Also:
        findFirstVisibleItemPosition(RecyclerView)

      • findFirstVisibleItemPosition

        public static int findFirstVisibleItemPosition(androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView)
        Helper method to find the adapter position of the first partially visible view [for each span], no matter which Layout is.
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - the RecyclerView with LayoutManager instance in use
        Returns:
        the adapter position of the first partially visible item or RecyclerView.NO_POSITION if there aren't any visible items.
        Since:
        5.0.0-rc1
        See Also:
        findFirstCompletelyVisibleItemPosition(RecyclerView)

      • findLastCompletelyVisibleItemPosition

        Helper method to find the adapter position of the last completely visible view [for each span], no matter which Layout is.
        Parameters:
